data.text: Dawuda xa bɛɛti bɛɛtibae xa mangɛ bɛ
Alatala, n natanga mixi ɲaaxie yi ra,
naxee natɛ tongoma e bɔɲɛ ma gere masofe ra lɔxɔ yo lɔxɔ.
E xa wɔyɛnyi xɔnɔ alɔ bɔximase xa xɔnɛ. Ɲɛngi rate.
Alatala, i xa n natanga mixi ɲaaxie bɛlɛxɛ i.
I xa n natanga yɛtɛ igboe xa gantanyi nun luutie ma,
Alatala, n Marigi Ala nan i ra.
i naxa tin mixi kobie waxɔnfe ra,
N gerefae xa fe ɲaaxi maxirixie xa gbilen e ma.
Tɛ wole xa dɔxɔ e xun na,
Fe ɲaaxi rabae naxa sabati yi bɔxi ma,
N a kolon Alatala kiiti fanyi sama nɛ misikiinɛe bɛ,
